name: dollarFormat
description: Formats a money string in U.S. currency format.

coldfusion.notes:
DollarFormat Rounding Bug CF-4199995 - Certain inputs do not cause dollarFormat to round up, for example 6.5850 results in $6.58, yet 6.585 results in $6.59. Consider using numberFormat as a workaround.
https://tracker.adobe.com/#/view/CF-4199995

lucee.notes:
This bug mentioned for ACF also existed in Lucee 4.5, but seams to be fixed in Lucee 5.
https://luceeserver.atlassian.net/browse/LDEV-574

examples.title: Format Positive Numbers
examples.description: Dollar Format is about $, commas, and 2 decimal places
